Uses of Package
uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data

  • Packages that use uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data 
    Package Description
    uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data  
    uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui  
  • Classes in uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data used by uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data 
    Class and Description
    Discount
    Called by Order every time an Item is added to determine if any discounts should be applied to an order and calculates the prices accordingly.
    DrinkType
    The Enum DrinkType - Used to represent a type of Drink
    Item
    Interface used to represent a particular "item" or "product" able to be added to an Order.
    Order
    Represents an individual order stored within 'orderArray' inside Till .
    OrderItem
    "Wrapper" class used to represent an individual item and it's quantity in Order
    PizzaType
    The Enum PizzaType - Used to represent a type of Pizza.
    Product
    Abstract class used to contain methods for shared information between Pizza, Drink and Side products.
    SideType
    The Enum SideType - Used to represent a type of Side
    Size
    The Enum Size - Used to represent the size of a Pizza, Drink or Side.
    Till
    Main data class in the application that is used by GUI elements to control the Till.
  • Classes in uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data used by uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui 
    Class and Description
    Till
    Main data class in the application that is used by GUI elements to control the Till.
